text: Bernard Guignedoux (31 January 1947 – 1 January 2021)Bernard Guignedoux nous a quittés was a French footballer and manager. He was the first player in Paris Saint-Germain to score a goal in the team's history. ==Death== In April 2020, Guignedoux was hospitalised for a "serious illness". He died on 1 January 2021, at the age of 73. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Europe Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals RC Paris 1965–66 Division 2 22 3 1 0 0 0 23 3 Paris Saint-Germain 1970–71 Division 2 32 8 3 1 0 0 35 9 1971–72 Division 1 37 6 1 0 0 0 38 6 Total 69 14 4 1 0 0 73 15 Paris FC 1972–73 Division 1 20 6 3 0 0 0 23 6 1973–74 Division 1 34 2 1 1 0 0 35 3 Total 54 8 4 1 0 0 58 9 Monaco 1974–75 Division 1 38 2 1 0 2 0 41 2 1975–76 Division 1 31 1 1 0 0 0 32 1 1976–77 Division 2 25 1 2 1 0 0 27 2 Total 94 4 4 1 2 0 100 5 Paris FC 1977–78 Division 2 25 2 3 0 0 0 28 2 1978–79 Division 1 2 0 0 0 0 0 2 0 1979–80 Division 2 8 0 0 0 0 0 8 0 Total 35 2 3 0 0 0 38 2 Career total 274 31 16 2 2 0 292 33 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Île-de-France Category:French football managers Category:People from Yvelines
